Sentencas: This paper proposes a new configuration of distributed generation system fed by a fuel cell and operating side by side with dynamic voltage restorer (DVR).
Titulo: Distributed grid-connected SOFC supporting a multilevel dynamic voltage restorer

Sentencas: In this configuration, the solid oxide fuel cell serves the double purpose of injecting power in the grid as well as feeding a DVR, which precludes the need for an extra energy source.
Titulo: Distributed grid-connected SOFC supporting a multilevel dynamic voltage restorer

Sentencas: Such solution is not only a mean to produce clean energy, but also can participate in the power quality improvement.
Titulo: Distributed grid-connected SOFC supporting a multilevel dynamic voltage restorer

Sentencas: In order to strengthen the last aspect, multilevel inverters are used in both shunt and series grid connections.
Titulo: Distributed grid-connected SOFC supporting a multilevel dynamic voltage restorer

Sentencas: The aim of this paper is the modeling and control of the proposed double task system, and showing its grid-friendly behavior.
Titulo: Distributed grid-connected SOFC supporting a multilevel dynamic voltage restorer

Sentencas: To illustrate its performance, extensive simulation results are carried out under a variety of operating conditions.
Titulo: Distributed grid-connected SOFC supporting a multilevel dynamic voltage restorer
